headline.print_headline: 5 Killed When Van Smashes Into Car in California
headline.main: 5 Killed When Van Smashes Into Car in California

docs.snippet: A van hit and landed on top of a sedan sitting at a stop sign in this Southern California desert town on Sunday, crushing the car and killing the five people inside, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A van hit and landed on top of a sedan sitting at a stop sign in this Southern California desert town on Sunday, crushing the car and killing the five people inside, authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Clippers Rally Late to Stun Thunder, Tie Series
headline.main: Clippers Rally Late to Stun Thunder, Tie Series

docs.snippet: The Los Angeles Clippers rallied for a wild 101-99 victory over the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday to even their best-of-seven Western Conference semi-final at 2-2....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers rallied for a wild 101-99 victory over the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday to even their best-of-seven Western Conference semi-final at 2-2.

headline.print_headline: UK Employers Plan to Hire at Fastest Pace Since 2007-Report
headline.main: UK Employers Plan to Hire at Fastest Pace Since 2007-Report

docs.snippet: British employers plan to hire staff at the fastest rate since the early days of the financial crisis, a business survey showed on Monday in a further sign the economy is picking up speed....
docs.lead_paragraph: British employers plan to hire staff at the fastest rate since the early days of the financial crisis, a business survey showed on Monday in a further sign the economy is picking up speed.

headline.print_headline: Penske Sweeps Top 3 Spots on Slow Day at Indy
headline.main: Penske Sweeps Top 3 Spots on Slow Day at Indy

docs.snippet: Roger Penske's team got off to a fast start on a slow day at Indianapolis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Roger Penske's team got off to a fast start on a slow day at Indianapolis.

headline.print_headline: UK Business Lobby Sees Brighter Economic Outlook, Boosted by Investment
headline.main: UK Business Lobby Sees Brighter Economic Outlook, Boosted by Investment

docs.snippet: Britain's top business lobby upgraded its economic growth forecasts for this year and next on Monday and said it expects to see marked improvements in British business investment and productivity....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's top business lobby upgraded its economic growth forecasts for this year and next on Monday and said it expects to see marked improvements in British business investment and productivity.

headline.print_headline: UK Museum Launches Digital WWI Database
headline.main: UK Museum Launches Digital WWI Database

docs.snippet: A British museum is launching an ambitious online database to remember the lives of the millions of men and women who served in World War I....
docs.lead_paragraph: A British museum is launching an ambitious online database to remember the lives of the millions of men and women who served in World War I.

headline.main: Party Chief's Downfall a Central Act in Tiananmen Drama

docs.snippet: Zhao Ziyang, the embattled Communist Party general secretary, appeared to have misread treacherous political currents and was outmaneuvered by Deng Xiaoping....

keywords.value: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
keywords.name: organizations

docs.abstract: Zhao Ziyang, the embattled Communist Party general secretary, appeared to have misread treacherous political currents and was outmaneuvered by Deng Xiaoping.

headline.print_headline: Actor Hartnett Takes on Mystery and Monsters in 'Penny Dreadful'
headline.main: Actor Hartnett Takes on Mystery and Monsters in 'Penny Dreadful'

docs.snippet: Monsters and murders of the Victorian age come alive in Showtime's new supernatural drama "Penny Dreadful," as actor Josh Hartnett leads a band of gothic mavericks to uncover the terrors that attack the city of London....
docs.lead_paragraph: Monsters and murders of the Victorian age come alive in Showtime's new supernatural drama "Penny Dreadful," as actor Josh Hartnett leads a band of gothic mavericks to uncover the terrors that attack the city of London.

headline.print_headline: At Least 15 Killed in Congo Football Stadium Stampede
headline.main: At Least 15 Killed in Congo Football Stadium Stampede

docs.snippet: At least 15 people were killed after police fired tear gas in a crowded football stadium in Democratic Republic of Congo, provoking a stampede, according to a police source and a local official....
docs.lead_paragraph: At least 15 people were killed after police fired tear gas in a crowded football stadium in Democratic Republic of Congo, provoking a stampede, according to a police source and a local official.

headline.print_headline: Samsung Chairman Hospitalized After Heart Attack
headline.main: Samsung Chairman Hospitalized After Heart Attack

docs.snippet: Samsung Electronics Co. Chairman Lee Kun-hee remained hospitalized in stable condition Monday after being treated for a heart attack, company officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Samsung Electronics Co. Chairman Lee Kun-hee remained hospitalized in stable condition Monday after being treated for a heart attack, company officials said.
